project.description:
Red Hat JBoss Developer Studio Integration Stack publishing from staging

This job should be run after a good build of:

https://devstudiois-jenkins.rhev-ci-vms.eng.rdu2.redhat.com/job/devstudio-is-aggregate/

Source site:

https://devstudio.redhat.com/11/staging/updates/integration-stack/${VERSION}

Resulting sites/files: (e.g. 11.0.0.CR1) - Mirrored to https://devstudio.redhat.com/static/11/...

  • https://devstudio.redhat.com/11/development/updates/integration-stack/${VERSION}
  • https://devstudio.redhat.com/11/development/updates/integration-stack/${VERSION}/earlyaccess
  • https://devstudio.redhat.com/11/development/updates/integration-stack/discovery/${VERSION}/
  • https://devstudio.redhat.com/11/development/updates/integration-stack/${VERSION}/devstudio-integration-stack-${VERSION}-updatesite.zip
  • https://devstudio.redhat.com/11/development/updates/integration-stack/${VERSION}/devstudio-integration-stack-${VERSION}-updatesite-earlyaccess.zip

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_TYPE
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: The type of build being published: <li> integration (better than nightly/snapshot/CI, but not quite a milestone - for use with downstream components) <li> development (milestone) <li> stable (release)

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: EA_ENABLED
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Check box to process early access components and metadata.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: VERSION_MAJOR
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: The base Eclipse platform to which this build is targeted.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SOURCE_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Relative path under https://devstudio.redhat.com/ to the update site folder you want to promote.
